snippet: The cost to New Jersey taxpayers for Gov. Chris Christie’s internal inquiry into lane closings at the George Washington Bridge is likely to reach several million dollars, outpacing early estimates.
abstract: Cost to New Jersey taxpayers for Gov Chris Christie's internal inquiry into lane closings at George Washington Bridge is likely to reach several million dollars, outpacing earlier estimates and touching off urgent attempts to reduce costs; overall bill for three-month inquiry could be as high as $3 million.
lead_paragraph: The cost to New Jersey taxpayers for Gov. Chris Christie’s internal inquiry into lane closings at the George Washington Bridge is likely to reach several million dollars, outpacing early estimates.

headline.main: Taxpayers’ Bill in Bridge Inquiry Soars
headline.print_headline: Taxpayers’ Bill in Bridge Inquiry Soars

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
